pullRequest.title: Fix #8589: Make coordinate parsing more strict
pullRequest.bodyText: We now forbid all special characters of the coordinates to occur between the coordinate parts.

beforeCommit.message:
Fix #8589: Make coordinate parsing more strict

We now only parse coordinates if the coordinate parts are separated by
whitespace.

nodes.bodyText:
this can be replaced by
       assertParsingFails("2.2.3.8");

this can be replaced by
    assertParsingFails("6, 12, 16, 29");

commit.message:
Fix #8589: Make coordinate parsing more strict

We now forbid all special characters of the coordinates to occur between
the coordinate parts.
